CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sierra Bancorp is a California-based bank holding company, which offers a range of retail and commercial banking services. The bank provides lending money, which includes customers such as real estate, commercial, mortgage warehousing, agricultural, and consumer loans. The bank accepts deposits for individuals and businesses, including checking accounts, savings accounts, money market demand accounts, time deposits, retirement accounts, and sweep accounts.
